page.title: 11RUISLIP MANOR HIGH STREET
page.content: Ruislip Manor is mainly residential, with houses priced between Â£60 000 and Â£80 000. There is one main shopping area where most of the shops are small stores with single frontage. The shops in Ruislip Manor were all built in the 1930's, before which the area was dominated by countryside. Interestingly, apart from six shops which have been running a successful business for at least twenty years, none of the remaining shops had been operating under their current form for more than three years.This showed that no long-term business had flourished in Ruislip Manor since 1965. Many shop owners put this down to the lack of a large supermarket or chainstore in the vicinity. Many felt that if plans to open a Manor branch of Sainsbury went ahead it would improve their trade.
